desc_content.paragraph: Channel defining pose data for a bone in a Pose
X-axis handle offset for start of the B-Bone’s curve, adjusts curvature
Y-axis handle offset for start of the B-Bone’s curve, adjusts curvature
X-axis handle offset for end of the B-Bone’s curve, adjusts curvature
Y-axis handle offset for end of the B-Bone’s curve, adjusts curvature
Bone that serves as the end handle for the B-Bone curve
Bone that serves as the start handle for the B-Bone curve
Length of first Bezier Handle (for B-Bones only)
Length of second Bezier Handle (for B-Bones only)
Roll offset for the start of the B-Bone, adjusts twist
Roll offset for the end of the B-Bone, adjusts twist
Scale factor for start of the B-Bone, adjusts thickness (for tapering effects)
Scale factor for end of the B-Bone, adjusts thickness (for tapering effects)
Bone associated with this PoseBone
Bone Group this pose channel belongs to
Bone Group this pose channel belongs to (0=no group)
Child of this pose bone
Constraints that act on this PoseChannel
Object that defines custom draw type for this bone
Adjust the size of the custom shape
Bone that defines the display transform of this custom shape
Location of head of the channel’s bone

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), (readonly)

desc_content.paragraph: Weight of scale constraint for IK
Maximum angles for IK Limit
Maximum angles for IK Limit
Maximum angles for IK Limit
Minimum angles for IK Limit
Minimum angles for IK Limit
Minimum angles for IK Limit
Weight of rotation constraint for IK
IK stiffness around the X axis
IK stiffness around the Y axis
IK stiffness around the Z axis
Allow scaling of the bone for IK
Is part of an IK chain

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Disallow movement around the X axis
Disallow movement around the Y axis
Disallow movement around the Z axis
Lock editing of location in the interface

field_body.paragraph: boolean array of 3 items, default (False, False, False)

desc_content.paragraph: Lock editing of rotation in the interface

field_body.paragraph: boolean array of 3 items, default (False, False, False)

desc_content.paragraph: Lock editing of ‘angle’ component of four-component rotations in the interface
Lock editing of four component rotations by components (instead of as Eulers)
Lock editing of scale in the interface

field_body.paragraph: boolean array of 3 items, default (False, False, False)

desc_content.paragraph: Final 4x4 matrix after constraints and drivers are applied (object space)
Alternative access to location/scale/rotation relative to the parent and own rest bone
4x4 matrix, before constraints
Motion Path for this element
Parent of this pose bone
Angle of Rotation for Axis-Angle rotation representation

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Rotation in Eulers

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)

list_item.paragraph: XYZ XYZ Euler, XYZ Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
XZY XZY Euler, XZY Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
YXZ YXZ Euler, YXZ Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
YZX YZX Euler, YZX Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
ZXY ZXY Euler, ZXY Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
ZYX ZYX Euler, ZYX Rotation Order (prone to Gimbal Lock).
AXIS_ANGLE Axis Angle, Axis Angle (W+XYZ), defines a rotation around some axis defined by 3D-Vector.

desc_content.paragraph: Rotation in Quaternions

field_body.paragraph: float array of 4 items in [-inf, inf], default (1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (1.0, 1.0, 1.0)

desc_content.paragraph: Location of tail of the channel’s bone

field_body.paragraph: float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), (readonly)

desc_content.paragraph: Scale the custom object by the bone length
Limit movement around the X axis
Limit movement around the Y axis
Limit movement around the Z axis
Apply channel size as IK constraint if stretching is enabled
Apply channel rotation as IK constraint
The name of this bone before any ‘.’ character (readonly)
The midpoint between the head and the tail. (readonly)
(readonly)
A list of all children from this bone. Warning: takes O(len(bones)**2) time. (readonly)

Returns a chain of children with the same base name as this bone. Only direct chains are supported, forks caused by multiple children with matching base names will terminate the function and not be returned. Warning: takes O(len(bones)**2) time. (readonly)
The distance from head to tail, when set the head is moved to fit the length.
A list of parents, starting with the immediate parent (readonly)
The direction this bone is pointing. Utility function for (tail - head) (readonly)
Vector pointing down the x-axis of the bone. (readonly)
Vector pointing down the y-axis of the bone. (readonly)
Vector pointing down the z-axis of the bone. (readonly)
Calculate bone envelope at given point

field_body.paragraph: point (float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf]) – Point, Position in 3d space to evaluate

desc_content.paragraph: Retrieve the matrix of the B-Bone segment if available

list_item.paragraph: index (int in [0, inf]) – Index of the segment
rest (boolean, (optional)) – Return the rest pose matrix

field_body.paragraph: The resulting matrix in bone local space
float multi-dimensional array of 4 * 4 items in [-inf, inf]

desc_content.paragraph: Retrieve the vectors and rolls coming from B-Bone custom handles

list_item.paragraph: rest (boolean, (optional)) – Return the rest pose state
ease (boolean, (optional)) – Apply scale from ease values
offsets (boolean, (optional)) – Apply roll and curve offsets from bone properties

field_body.paragraph: handle1, The direction vector of the start handle in bone local space, float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf]
roll1, Roll of the start handle, float in [-inf, inf]
handle2, The direction vector of the end handle in bone local space, float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf]
roll2, Roll of the end handle, float in [-inf, inf]

desc_content.paragraph: The same as ‘bone in other_bone.parent_recursive’ but saved generating a list.
Utility function to add vec to the head and tail of this bone

field_body.paragraph: The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
